articles.description: Jeymes Samuel deepens the irreverent narrative in "The Book of Clarence" by showing brutal biblical scenes through a modern lens. (Spoilers ahead!)
articles.content:
Spoiler alert! We're discussing important plot points and the ending of "The Book of Clarence" (in theaters now), so beware if you haven't seen it yet.
The Book of Clarence tells a different sort of… [+4074 chars]
